name: John Doe
summary: Experienced Python developer with 6+ years of experience in web development, cloud technologies, and team leadership. Passionate about building scalable applications and mentoring junior developers.

highlights: Led development of microservices architecture serving 1M+ users
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%
Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted code reviews
Optimized database queries improving response time by 40%
Developed REST APIs using Django and Flask
Integrated third-party services and payment systems
Implemented automated testing with 90% code coverage
Deployed on AWS with Docker containers
Features include blog, project showcase, and contact form
